date: Sun May 22 2022 13:38:04 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)
pageTitle: Mbappe decides to stay as PSG
description: French superstar Kylian Mbappé will stay at Paris Saint-Germain rather than join Real Madrid, ending one of football's biggest transfer sagas.  LaLiga will take legal action against Paris Saint-Germain over their renewal of Kylian Mbappe's contract.
metaDescription: An illustration of French superstar Kylian Mbappé who has decided to stay at Paris Saint-Germain rather than join Real Madrid, ending one of football's biggest transfer sagas.
topicText:
'Insult to football': Superstar roasted after 'scandalous' $898m ...
Kylian Mbappe said he was “very happy” to stay at Paris Saint-Germain after the club's president announced on Saturday the World Cup winner was rejecting ...
Kylian Mbappe signs three-year deal at PSG after rejecting Real ...
The Kylian Mbappe transfer saga came to a conclusion on Saturday amid confirmation he signed a three-year deal at Paris Saint-Germain.
Kylian Mbappé decides to stay at PSG instead of joining Real Madrid
The France striker Kylian Mbappé will extend his stay at PSG after speculation he would leave for Real Madrid.
Kylian Mbappe picks PSG over Real Madrid: New contract details ...
Just days after announcing that he would make his transfer decision before the end of May, PSG have confirmed Kylian Mbappe has signed a new contract.
Kylian Mbappe decision fallout - LaLiga to take legal action on PSG ...
LaLiga will take legal action against Paris Saint-Germain over their renewal of Kylian Mbappe's contract.
Kylian Mbappé agrees to three-year contract extension with Paris ...
French superstar Kylian Mbappé has decided to stay at Paris Saint-Germain rather than join Real Madrid, ending one of football's biggest transfer sagas.
